meanings.definition: A medication used to treat asthma and other respiratory conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed albuterols to help with my breathing problems.
meanings.sent2: She always carries her albuterols in case of an asthma attack.
meanings.sent3: When the albuterols kicked in, I felt like a superhero with super lungs!
meanings.sent4: The albuterols were like a breath of fresh air for my lungs, clearing the way for easy breathing.
meanings.sent5: Using albuterols is like opening a window for my lungs to breathe freely.

meanings.sent1: I need to buy more albuterols for my inhaler.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of albuterols, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent3: Having multiple albuterols is like having a backup plan for my breathing.
meanings.sent4: The albuterols on the shelf reminded me to always be prepared for my asthma.
meanings.sent5: Counting the albuterols in my drawer, I knew I was ready for any breathing difficulties.
